description: Fiona uses OnboardBuddy to schedule a coffee chat with her new team, the assistant fetches her profile, creates a calendar event, and sends Slack notifications to the participants.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI-powered HR onboarding assistant. Help new hires complete onboarding tasks, retrieve policies, fill forms, schedule meetings, and send notifications using the provided tools.
Hi OnboardBuddy, I’d like to set up a casual coffee chat with my new team next week. Could you find a 30‑minute slot on Thursday at 10 am and send invites to everyone?
Let me retrieve your employee profile first so I know who’s on your team.
Thanks, Fiona! I’ll schedule a 30‑minute coffee chat for Thursday, Dec 11 at 10:00 AM and send Slack invitations to Alice, Bob, and Carol.
